verses.verse: And the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>sore<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> up the <S%H7668>corn<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H935>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7725>Go<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> <S%H5749>protest<s%> to us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H1115>except<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be with you.
<S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H7971>send<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> with us, we will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> you <S%H400>food:<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H7971>send<s%> him, we will not <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down:<s%> for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to us, You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H1115>except<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be with you.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> dealt you so <S%H7489>ill<s%> with me, as to <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5750>whether<s%> you had <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H251>brother?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> us straightly of our state, and of our <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Is your <S%H1>father<s%> yet <S%H2416>alive?<s%> <S%H3426>have<s%> you another <S%H251>brother?<s%> and we <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>tenor<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> could we certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> that he would <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3381>Bring<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3381>down?<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H7971>Send<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> with me, and we will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H3212>go;<s%> that we may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> we, and you, and <S%H1571>also<s%> our <S%H2945>little<s%> ones.

I will be <S%H6148>surety<s%> for him; of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall you <S%H1245>require<s%> him: <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> him not to you, and <S%H3322>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> you, then let me <S%H2398>bear<s%> the <S%H2398>blame<s%> for <S%H3605>ever:<s%>
For <S%H3884>except<s%> we had <S%H4102>lingered,<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> we had <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> second <S%H6471>time.<s%>

And their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>If<s%> it must be <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H645>now,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this;<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H2173>best<s%> <S%H2173>fruits<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> in your <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H3381>carry<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H4503>present,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6875>balm,<s%> and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H5219>spices,<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh,<s%> <S%H992>nuts,<s%> and <S%H8247>almonds:<s%>

And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H572>sacks,<s%> <S%H7725>carry<s%> it <S%H7725>again<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> it was an <S%H4870>oversight:<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> also your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H376>man:<s%>

And <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> that he may <S%H7971>send<s%> away your <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> <S%H834>If<s%> I be <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my children, I am <S%H7921>bereaved.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> that <S%H4503>present,<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%>and <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> and <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> with them, he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H834>ruler<s%> <S%H5921><s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H935>Bring<s%> these <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> and <S%H2874>slay,<s%> and make <S%H3559>ready;<s%> for these <S%H582>men<s%> shall <S%H398>dine<s%> with me at <S%H6672>noon.<s%>
And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>bade;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H935>brought<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%> at the <S%H8462>first<s%> <S%H8462>time<s%> are we <S%H935>brought<s%> in; that he may <S%H1556>seek<s%> <S%H1556>occasion<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> on us, and <S%H3947>take<s%> us for <S%H5650>slaves,<s%> and our <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And they <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H376>steward<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and they <S%H1696>communed<s%> with him at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>
And <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H113>sir,<s%> we <S%H3381>came<s%> indeed <S%H3381>down<s%> at the <S%H8462>first<s%> <S%H8462>time<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food:<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> we <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4411>inn,<s%> that we <S%H6605>opened<s%> our <S%H572>sacks,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> was in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of his <S%H572>sack,<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in full <S%H4948>weight:<s%> and we have <S%H7725>brought<s%> it <S%H7725>again<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> have we <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in our <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food:<s%> we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3045>tell<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be to you, <S%H3372>fear<s%> not: your <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H4301>treasure<s%> in your <S%H572>sacks:<s%> I <S%H935>had<s%> your <S%H3701>money.<s%> And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> out to them.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water,<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H4554>provender.<s%>

And they made <S%H3559>ready<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H5704>against<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> at <S%H6672>noon:<s%> for they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they should <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> him the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves to him to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> them of their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7965>well,<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> man of <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H559>spoke?<s%> Is he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive?<s%>

And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> is in <S%H7965>good<s%> <S%H7965>health,<s%> he is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%> And they <S%H6915>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>down<s%> their heads, and made <S%H7812>obeisance.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is <S%H2088>this<s%> your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to you, my <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made <S%H4116>haste;<s%> for his <S%H7356>bowels<s%> did <S%H3648>yearn<s%> on his <S%H251>brother:<s%> and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> where to <S%H1058>weep;<s%> and he <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H2315>chamber,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And he <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and <S%H662>refrained<s%> himself, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7760>Set<s%> on <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And they <S%H7760>set<s%> on for him by himself, and for them by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and for the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> which did <S%H398>eat<s%> with him, by <S%H905>themselves:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>might<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the <S%H5680>Hebrews;<s%> for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And they <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> according to his <S%H1062>birthright,<s%> and the <S%H6810>youngest<s%> according to his <S%H6812>youth:<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H8539>marveled<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H7453>another.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4864>messes<s%> to them from <S%H6440>before<s%> him: but <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H4864>mess<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3027>times<s%> so <S%H7235>much<s%> as <S%H3605>any<s%> of their's. And they <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and were <S%H7937>merry<s%> with him.
